newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch.

text.p: * Microsoft Corp's share price was down 1-1/8 at 86 in London after the company warned of slower earnings growth next year. The software maker reported better than expected second quarter results after the close of trading Friday.
* International Business Machines Corp, which reports earnings on Tuesday, was down 1/2 at 164-3/4 in London, while Intel Corp was down 1/2 at 143-5/8.
* U.S. Robotics Corp is expected to report first quarter earnings per share of $0.72, up from $0.45 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 71-5/8 Friday.
* Kellogg Co is expected to report fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.77, flat with a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 66-1/2.
* PaineWebber Group Inc is expected to report fourth quarter earnings of $0.79 per share, up from $0.50 a year ago, according to First Call.
* Boise Cascade Corp is expected to report a fourth quarter loss per share of $0.47 a share, compared to a profit of $1.13 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 38-1/8.
* Raytheon Co is expected to report fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.75, down from $0.90 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 48-5/8.
* Conrail Inc shareholders on Friday derailed a planned $9.3 billion merger with CSX Corp, rejecting a key provision of the deal. Conrail closed at 103-1/2 and CSX closed at 46-3/4.
* Banc One Corp reported fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.85, up from $0.77 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 45-1/8.
